text:
BIDEN BOWS OUT


LATE REVERSAL UPENDS RACE FOR WHITE HOUSE AS PRESIDENT ENDORSES HARRIS TO LEAD TICKET


It has been the greatest honor of my life to serve as your President. And while it has been my intention to seek reelection, I believe it is in the best interest of my party and the country for me to stand down and to focus solely on fulfilling my duties as President for the remainder of my term

I will speak to the Nation later this week in more detail about my decision.
For now, let me express my deepest gratitude to all those who have worked so hard to see me reelected. I want to thank Vice President Kamala Harris for being an extraordinary partner in all this work. And let me express my heartfelt appreciation to the American people for the faith and
trust you have placed in me.

Rank-and-File Democrats Greet News With Hope and Hesitation

This article is by Patricia Mazzei,

they figured, their political party might stand a chance in Nove ber - though many still ex pressed deep doubts.
